english: to sing in the music class

to sing in the music class

chinese: 在日落之前在大海里游泳
english: to swim in the sea before sunset

english: swimming  in  the  sea  before sunset

chinese: 政策允许在日落之前在大海里，游泳
english: the policy permits swimming in the sea before sunset

chinese: 在日落之前在大海里游泳
english: to swim in the sea before sunset

chinese: 他的父亲允许他在日落之前在，大海里游泳
english: his father permits him to swim in the sea before sunset

chinese: 他为了他的健康停止抽烟
english: he  stopped  smoking  for  his health

english: he stopped to smoke at the bus stop
he stopped to buy some flowers
he stopped to buy some flowers

chinese: 他在他回家的路上停下来去买
english: he stopped to buy some flowers
he  stopped  buying  flowers  for her

english: 1.他（过去）停下来去喝一些水。 2.他（过去）停止喝水。 3.我记得昨天锁门（这件事）。 4.我忘记了昨天锁门（这件事）。
1.He stopped to drink some water. 2.He stopped drinking water. 3.I remember locking the door yesterday. 4.I forgot locking the door yesterday.
